p: A/Chicken/Jiangsu/07/2002 (H9N2) and A/Chicken/Henan/12/2004 (H5N1) were obtained from the Wuhan Institute of Virology, Chinese Academy of Sciences. A549 cells (80% confluent) were infected with H5N1 and H9N2 viruses at a multiplicity of infection (MOI) of 1 for 1 h, and viral growth medium (serum-free complete F-12K supplemented with 2 µg/mL of TPCK-treated trypsin) was added at 24 h.
